snippet: The Nets’ rebuilt starting lineup worked together well in the rebranded team’s first game, a 108-105 win over the 76ers to open the preseason.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets defeat Philadelphia 76ers, 108-105, in overtime, in preseason opener at their new Barclays Center arena.
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ rebuilt starting lineup worked together well in the rebranded team’s first game, a 108-105 win over the 76ers to open the preseason.

headline.seo: Nets Start Preseason With Road Win
headline.main: Nets Sharp, and Winners, in Preseason Opener
headline.print_headline: Nets Sharp, And Winners, In Opener
